title: mAniDa janmam
sahitya:
mAniDa janmam mINDUm vandiDumO ulagIr uyar


anupallavi

  jnAna vairAgyam tavam jIva kAruNyam uNmai
 jnAna bhakti paghuttarivuDan ihapara sukham tarum karuNaiyAm


caraNam    karuvaraiyinil kiDandu veLiyil varunduyar ninaindAlum uDal
 kalangudE ingE tighil maraNam enum vembuliyum shIrudE
				(madhyama kAlam)
 iruvinai vashamAi ivvuDaloru nIrkkumizhi idaniDai uyar neri aDaiyavE
 iraivanaruLai vENDi uDaiyarAgi iDaiyarAda tiruvaDi ninaivuDanE
 kaDimadil paNDaripuramadil oru murai kaNDu paNindu prabhO
 pANduranga jaya viTThala enru paNindiDa
